metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: HTML tables can have different sizes for each column, row or the entire table.
content.html: HTML tables can have different sizes for each column, row or the entire table.

content.text: Use the style attribute with the width or height properties to specify the size of a table, row or column.
content.html: Use the style attribute with the width or height properties to specify the size of a table, row or column.

content.text: To set the width of a table, add the style attribute to the <table> element:
content.html: To set the width of a table, add the style attribute to the <table> element:

content.code_html:
<table style="width:100%">
  <tr>
    <th>Firstname</th>
    <th>Lastname</th>
    <th>Age</th>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>Jill</td>
    <td>Smith</td>
    <td>50</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>Eve</td>
    <td>Jackson</td>
    <td>94</td>
  </tr>
</table>

content.text: Note: Using a percentage as the size unit for a width means how wide will this element be compared to its parent element, which in this case is the <body> element.
content.html: Note: Using a percentage as the size unit for a width means how wide will this element be compared to its parent element, which in this case is the <body> element.

content.text: To set the size of a specific column, add the style attribute on a <th> or <td> element:
content.html: To set the size of a specific column, add the style attribute on a <th> or <td> element:

content.code_html:
<table style="width:100%">
  <tr>
    <th style="width:70%">Firstname</th>
    <th>Lastname</th>
    <th>Age</th>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>Jill</td>
    <td>Smith</td>
    <td>50</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>Eve</td>
    <td>Jackson</td>
    <td>94</td>
  </tr>
</table>

content.text: To set the height of a specific row, add the style attribute on a table row element:
content.html: To set the height of a specific row, add the style attribute on a table row element:

content.code_html:
<table style="width:100%">
  <tr>
    <th>Firstname</th>
    <th>Lastname</th>
    <th>Age</th>
  </tr>
  <tr style="height:200px">
    <td>Jill</td>
    <td>Smith</td>
    <td>50</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>Eve</td>
    <td>Jackson</td>
    <td>94</td>
  </tr>
</table>

content.text: Exercise ? What is this? Test your skills by answering a few questions about the topics of this page
What is the correct CSS property for styling the width of a table?
content.html: What is the correct CSS property for styling the width of a table?
